author: gastown/polecats/furiosa
text:
Enforcer simulation transcripts (2026-02-23):

Dry-run activation:
`go run ./cmd/gt enforcer engage gastown --trigger queue-backlog --reason "simulation dry-run" --incident sim-20260223 --dry-run`
Result: planned park=yes, trigger=queue-backlog, incident=sim-20260223.

Live activation:
`go run ./cmd/gt enforcer engage gastown --trigger queue-backlog --reason "simulation live" --incident sim-20260223`
Result: rig parked, witness/refinery stopped, enforcer mode engaged.

Status during incident:
`go run ./cmd/gt enforcer status gastown`
Result: mode=engaged, rig parked=yes, trigger + reason + incident recorded.

Dry-run handback:
`go run ./cmd/gt enforcer handback gastown --reason "simulation complete" --resume --dry-run`
Result: planned unpark=yes.

Live handback:
`go run ./cmd/gt enforcer handback gastown --reason "simulation complete" --resume`
Result: rig unparked, witness/refinery restarted, enforcer mode cleared.

Final status:
`go run ./cmd/gt enforcer status gastown`
Result: mode=inactive, rig parked=no, handback metadata present.
